metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13566 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: SQL injection vulnerabilities exist in phpGACL 3.3.7. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to a SQL injection. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability In admin/edit_group.php, when the POST parameter action is “Delete”, the POST parameter delete_group leads to a SQL injection.

criterions.comment: phpgacl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
